attributes.action: The sovereignty of Gibraltar should not be allowed to cloud Brexit negotiations.
attributes.background: Gibraltar has been British since 1713. The Gibraltarian people voted to stay British in a 2002 referendum. We believe that the Government should say that Gibraltar's sovereignty is not in question during Brexit negotiations and should not be used as a bargaining chip in any Post Brexit deal.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/193782
